tool_description:
Twtrland is a social intelligence platform, serving over 2.5M monthly visitors, helping people and brands build their online identity. Through analysis of billions of pieces of content we have formed one of the richest social insight graphs with proprietary cross platform information. We have made this data visual, simple, and searchable through our social profiles, influencers search engine and the business dashboard.

Our API allows you to empower your applications with our insight graph.
name: Social Media Analytics
title: Social Media Analytics

api_list.name: Twitter Lookup
api_list.description: Get a social footprint of an entity on Twitter. Covering influence metrics, user information, close network, skills, followers demographics (locations, skills, influence levels, age groups).

required_parameters.name: screen_name
required_parameters.description: the twitter screen name of the requested entity

api_list.name: Influencers Search
api_list.description: Find social media influencers in a specific interest space

optional_parameters.name: typecastId
optional_parameters.description: Filter for Celebs / PowerUsers / Casual / Novice users

api_list.name: Twitter Demographics Lookup
api_list.description: Location, Gender and Age of twitter screen name
